name: ""Failsafe""
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMENDED SO IMAGES AREN'T CROPPED

You have been tasked with stopping a bomb from hitting a city, the only way to do this is by making its systems fail.

everything is done with mouse pointer.

Made for WOWIE game jam 3.0

All art and music is by me.

(except the font which you can find here: https://www.dafont.com/conthrax.font)
